top_insights.title: Retention softness in mid-tier members
top_insights.detail: The $8 tier shows above-baseline churn for three consecutive months, suggesting messaging and value packaging need reinforcement.

top_insights.title: MRR trend is climbing despite churn
top_insights.detail: MRR rose each month from October through January, indicating acquisition still outpaces cancellations.

top_insights.title: Behind-the-scenes content leads conversion
top_insights.detail: Behind-the-scenes posts produce the highest paid signups per post and should anchor the top-of-funnel cadence.

growth_retention.narrative: Subscriber growth remains healthy, but cancellations have climbed with scale. Focused retention interventions in the first 30 days should reduce churn and increase compounding MRR gains.

notes: Livestream replay clips improved signup quality but had lower conversion volume.
Adding explicit CTA text in post intros lifted paid signups in January.

blocks.title: Stabilize first-30-day retention
blocks.why_it_matters: Early churn drives the majority of monthly cancellations and suppresses compounding growth.
what_to_do: Create a 3-message onboarding sequence for new subscribers in week one.
Add a retention offer at day 21 for at-risk members.
Track 30-day save rate weekly in your ops sheet.
blocks.expected_impact: Reduce churn by 0.8 to 1.2 points over 6–8 weeks.

blocks.title: Double down on best converting content format
blocks.why_it_matters: Behind-the-scenes content already outperforms other formats on paid conversion and upgrade intent.
what_to_do: Increase behind-the-scenes output from 14 to 20 posts per month.
Package 2 premium mini-series per month tied to top fan questions.
Reuse top-performing clips in conversion-oriented email nudges.

blocks.title: Prepare pricing test for Q2
blocks.why_it_matters: ARPU is on track but can be lifted with better tier framing before scale plateaus.
what_to_do: A/B test a revised mid-tier value proposition and benefit stack.
Introduce annual prepay option with limited-time bonus.
Benchmark plan attach rate weekly during experiment window.
blocks.expected_impact: Increase ARPU by 5–8% if attach rate improves by 2 points.

milestone_gameplan.explanation: To reach $7,500 MRR in six months, you need approximately 268 net-new subscribers at current ARPU. Accounting for expected churn over the same period, gross acquisition should target roughly 310 subscribers.

warnings.message: Older posts from August may have incomplete view counts; conversion rates could be understated.

notes: Billing export timezone normalized to UTC.
Refunded transactions excluded from net-new MRR calculations.
